      • fullReindexSwitchover

        public void fullReindexSwitchover()
        Description copied from interface: ContentletIndexAPI
        This will drop old index and will point read aliases to new index. This method should be called after call to ContentletIndexAPI.setUpFullReindex()
        Specified by:
